HollowMod:FocusHealStart.NAME: Simple Focus
HollowMod:FocusHealStart.DESCRIPTION: [#60CFFF]Spell NL [#EFFAFF]Focus[] !HollowMod:focusCost!:  Heal !M!. NL Heals for 2 less each time it's used this combat. NL Exhaust on the final use.

HollowMod:AbyssShriek.DESCRIPTION: [#60CFFF]Spell NL [#696969]闇[] 2: Deal !D! damage to ALL Enemies. NL You cannot play any more アタック cards this turn.

HollowMod:BlackTendrils.NAME: 黒い巻きひげ

HollowMod:BlackTendrils.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: [#60CFFF]Spell NL [#696969]闇[] 2: Deal !D! damage to a random enemy. NL Heal for 50% the total damage dealt. (Including [#696969]闇[] bonus.) Exhaust.

HollowMod:HeavyBlow.NAME: Heavy Blow

HollowMod:HornetsHelp.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: [#60CFFF]味方 NL Gain X+1 ブロック !M! times. NL Deal X+1 打撃 to a random enemy !M! times.

HollowMod:LordofShades.NAME: Lord of Shades
HollowMod:LordofShades.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal NL [#696969]闇[] !M!: While [#696969]闇[] is active, 50% of all ブロック you gain is also gained as Thorn. All Thorn is reduced by half at the end of each turn.
